hurt.text: "Aaah, what a sweet voice, you're making my flowers drip."

naked.text: {self:subject} seems unperturbed. While making no effort to cover herself, she beckons to you, "Like what you see? Step a little closer and I'll show you a whole new world."

stunned.text: {self:subject} crumples onto the ground, "You will pay for this..."

taunt.text: "Be still! I'm going to have a lot of fun tormenting you inside my flower..."

tempt.text: "Don't worry cutie, I'll wring out your cum straight away."
"Come a little bit closer and partake in my scent..."

orgasm.text: Hah... Hah... That was... unexpected. Now I'm even more interested in you. Come, let's try this again!

makeOrgasm.text: "Ahahaha! Amazing! At this rate you'll be little more than fertilizer for me you know?"
"Ahahaha! that's the second! Are your balls dry yet?"
"And that's the first! Let's see if there's any more for me, hmm?"

describe.text:
{self:name} can only be described as an green amazoness sprouting from a tree.
While her body beneath her thighs are invisible to you, her voluptuous upper body extends out from a giant flower blooming on the side of the large tree in the courtyard. Her long hair is a deeper shade of green and extends down to the small of her back. Numerous fleshy red flowers adorn her body, each one lewdly slightly opening and closing as if breathing.
She looks at you with a hungry look in her eyes.

startBattle.text: "Come, scatter your seed and make my flowers bloom."

night.text: Tired after the night's games, you start trudging back to your place. As you're about to leave the grounds however, you smell a sweet scent in the air. The aroma seems to arouse you, but at the same time making your accumulated fatigue disappear like magic. You grin and thank {self:name-do} in your mind.

victory.text: She wins by fucking your ass
She wins by you fucking her ass

victory3p.text: {self:name} brings you to an orgasm while {other:subject} holds you down.

victory3pAssist.text: {self:name} brings {other:name-do} to an orgasm while you hold {other:direct-object} down.

intervene3p.text: While the fight is happening between you and {other:subject}, {self:name} sneaks up behind you and holds you down.

intervene3pAssist.text: While the fight is happening, {self:name} sneaks behind {other:name-do} and holds {other:direct-object} down.

recruitment.introduction: Rosea's a tree. If you want, I can plant her in the middle of the front lawn.
recruitment.confirm: Alright, you'll see her tomorrow at dusk.
